name: object2typescript
description: creates TypeScript dts JSON and JavaScript objects

scripts.test: npm run build && npx ava --serial --concurrency 1 --config ava.config.js
scripts.test-js: npm run build && npx ava --serial --concurrency 1 --config ava.config-js.js
scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.run: npm run build && rm -rf tmp && node --max-old-space-size=5000  dist/src/test.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc&& npm run copy
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && git commit -a -m 'version patch' && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm test && npm run test-js && npm run docs

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
